    - Description of perturbed gene (AARS2): The primary molecular and cellular function of gene AARS2 is to catalyze the attachment of alanine to tRNA(Ala) in a two-step reaction, thereby facilitating protein synthesis, and to edit incorrectly charged tRNA(Ala) via its editing domain.
